channel.title: PimpScape Reborn [317 - OldRsps] - [By: Sabsabi & Jack]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i47.tinypic.com/a0x9w2.png[/img][/center]
[b]Base:[/b] PimpScape (We Cleaned)
[b]Story between me and sabsabi[/b] [i]Well it's all pretty complicated, me and sabsabi met randomly in a chat. It was weeks, before we actuelly started to talk, when we relized we liked the same about RSPS. We both have pretty big servers, "SabsabiOnline" && "FalconPking". So we thought why dont we just make a unique private server? Or well remaking an old one.[/i]
[b]Updates[/b] - Made Varrock PVP, -> Sabsabi | Date: 04/01/2009 - Made sendFrame126 to change the names in the questTab -> Jack | Date: 04/01/2009 - Made teleports -> Jack | Date: 04/01/2009 - Added Kbd with throwing fire -> Jack | Date: 04/01/2009 - Added daganoths caves -> Jack | Date: 04/01/2009 - Added wildy in kBD -> Jack | Date: 04/01/2009 - Made KBD multi -> Jack | Date: 04/01/2009 - AutoCast support npc and player -> Jack | Date: 04/01/2009 - Pvp Shop. -> Jack| Date: 04/01/2009 10AM - Fixed Follow Player(Incombat) -> It Damages now . -> Sabsabi | Date: 04/01/2009 - Fixed, Banks are safe now. -> Sabsabi | Date: 04/01/2009 1:09 AM - Fixed the attacking while standing on the person -> Sabsabi | Date: 04/01/2009 idk AM - No more attacking inside the safe spots -> Sabsabi | Date: 05/01/2009 idk AM - Donator System -> Jack | Date: 06/01/2009 10:32am AM - I've been adding Edgeville wildy zone, and safe in the bank -> Jack | Date: 06/01/2009 23:00 AM - Dwarf to teleport you to the differend training spots -> Jack | Date: 06/01/2009 23:47 AM - Fixed xlog -> sabsabi | Date: 07/01/2009 - Fixed the max cash bug -> sabsabi | Date: 09/01/2009 - Fixed most commen dupes -> Sabsabi Date: 09/01/2009 - Added woodcutting + mining -> sabsabi | Date: 10/01/2009 - Added fishing+cooking -> Jack | Date: 10/01/2009
Client Side, HeadIcons loading through the cache -> Jack | 03/01/2009 Whip 474 Animation -> Jack | 04/01/2009
Cooking [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/53x0kl.png[/img]
Woodcutting [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2928rcl.png[/img]

item.title: PimpScape Reborn [317 - OldRsps] - [By: Sabsabi & Jack]
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“sabsabi, post:60, topic:323786”][quote author=Lin link=topic=420189.msg3097077#msg3097077 date=1263421767]

[quote author=jensie link=topic=420189.msg3096874#msg3096874 date=1263405453]
Looks like the ancient deal is being revived! NICE!
[/quote]Not really.

We’re not haters, but are looking out for your project. Stop ignoring criticism and realize this server isn’t going to be like PimpScape at all if you keep adding more stuff and custom client edits. Cows has a point. This is going to turn out like Back to Basics and go down the drain.
[/quote][quote author=k0 twin link=topic=420189.msg3097163#msg3097163 date=1263428410]

Looks like the ancient deal is being revived! NICE!
[/quote]Not really.

We’re not haters, but are looking out for your project. Stop ignoring criticism and realize this server isn’t going to be like PimpScape at all if you keep adding more stuff and custom client edits. Cows has a point. This is going to turn out like Back to Basics and go down the drain.

Agreed. I don’t always think it’s better for a server to be as similar to runescape as possible. People seek out these servers to escape, not join a parallel game. That’s what made the old servers like PimpScape, Dunescape etc so great. Simplicity can and usually is a good thing.

Well thanks for the comments,

And we’ll see about the donating thing what we can do,[/quote]

Hey it’s your server. You do whatever you want. All everyone is trying to do is guide you somewhat. But in the end do whatever makes you happy.

Read full topic

Agreed. I don’t always think it’s better for a server to be as similar to runescape as possible. People seek out these servers to escape, not join a parallel game. That’s what made the old servers like PimpScape, Dunescape etc so great. Simplicity can and usually is a good thing.[/quote]

And we’ll see about the donating thing what we can do,

item.title: PimpScape Reborn [317 - OldRsps] - [By: Sabsabi & Jack]
item.dc:creator: @sabsabi sabsabi
item.description:
@sabsabi wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:43, topic:323786”][quote author=sabsabi link=topic=420189.msg3094249#msg3094249 date=1263146243]

Wow. Sorry to say this, but way to ruin the server and add a shop that requires payment. You may call it donate, but you’re really paying to use the shop, and that killed servers. This one is bound to now fail.
[/quote][quote author=krackkid link=topic=420189.msg3094061#msg3094061 date=1263135294]

Wow. Sorry to say this, but way to ruin the server and add a shop that requires payment. You may call it donate, but you’re really paying to use the shop, and that killed servers. This one is bound to now fail.

I agree, having to pay to use a shop…that just fails epicly.

I guess you guys dont know how to keep a server alive, and me and TimeTm we have big server togheter we have like 750 players, so we have experience we know what we do,

Lin , i guess your runescape 2 remake, isnt original idea, ive seen 89 projects about bringing back old runescape, its only a donator shop, But you dont have to donate to play? and all servers has donator features? im probably sure you will make your server only donators can play it, so stop hating and being jealous, we already got our players, so we are sure we gonna rank this server.

@ krackkid

Stop thinking your cool because lin said something u say after her,

well haters makes my server more famous.
[/quote]

The fact that you even implied the fact that servers have donator features implies that you and your project will fail. Having ‘special features’ (especially for an old school rsps like this) for a LEARNING PURPOSES ONLY server (which is what MoparScape is originally intended to achieve. Learning of programming using a Java language. Not Learning of tryng to make money off ‘cool’ pixels.

Learn to program, not to make a franchise.[/quote]

Its NOT about MAKING MONEY ITS ABOUT TO GET A GOOD FREAKIN DEDICATED SERVER TO MAKE SURE 24/7!

Wow, i love how people are haters there, we are nearly done to.

Latest Update:

Fixed some Packets Crashes.
Instant Processing,
Made Packets with arrays (im done with the Hashmap finally.)

Read full topic

well haters makes my server more famous. :)[/quote]

The fact that you even implied the fact that servers have donator features implies that you and your project will fail. Learning of programming using a Java language. Not Learning of tryng to make money off ‘cool’ pixels.

Learn to program, not to make a franchise.
